overview: This architecture analysis provides a comprehensive overview of the Azure Web Application Architecture, focusing on security considerations, data flows, trust boundaries, and actionable recommendations to enhance the security posture of the application.

components.name: Users
components.description: End-users accessing the application through a web interface.
security_considerations: User education on phishing attacks.
Multi-factor authentication for access.
components.data_handling: User data is processed and stored securely.

components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Manages incoming traffic and routes it to the appropriate services.
security_considerations: Web Application Firewall (WAF) rules configured to block common attack patterns.
SSL termination to ensure secure traffic.
components.data_handling: Traffic is inspected and routed securely.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Provides security by filtering and monitoring HTTP traffic.
security_considerations: Regular updates to WAF rules to protect against new vulnerabilities.
Logging and monitoring of blocked requests.

components.name: Load Balancers
components.description: Distributes incoming application traffic across multiple servers.
security_considerations: Health probes to ensure only healthy instances receive traffic.
Network Security Groups (NSGs) to restrict access.
components.data_handling: Traffic is balanced and routed securely.

components.name: App Service
security_considerations: Use of managed identities for Azure resources.
Regular patching and updates.
components.data_handling: Processes application logic and user requests.

components.name: Web App
components.description: The main application component serving user requests.
security_considerations: Input validation to prevent injection attacks.
Regular security testing and code reviews.
components.data_handling: Handles user data and application logic.

components.name: Web App Worker Pools
components.description: Processes background tasks for the web application.
security_considerations: Isolation of worker pools to prevent cross-application access.
Use of managed identities for secure resource access.
components.data_handling: Handles background processing and task execution.

components.name: Azure SQL Database
security_considerations: Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) for data at rest.
Firewall rules to restrict access.
components.data_handling: Stores sensitive user and application data.

components.name: Bastion Host
components.description: Provides secure access to virtual machines without exposing them to the public internet.
security_considerations: No public IP addresses for VMs.
Secure access through Azure Bastion only.

components.name: Azure Management Portal
security_considerations: Multi-factor authentication for portal access.
Role-based access control for resource management.
components.data_handling: Management of Azure resources and configurations.

components.name: Identity, Secrets & Access Management
components.description: Manages user identities, secrets, and access controls.
security_considerations: Use of Azure Key Vault for managing secrets securely.
Regular audits of access permissions.
components.data_handling: Manages sensitive information and access controls.

components.name: System Health Monitoring
security_considerations: Alerts configured for suspicious activities.
Regular reviews of logs for anomalies.
components.data_handling: Collects and analyzes performance and security data.
